data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Woqooyi Galbeed, Somalia honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Woqooyi Galbeed, Somalia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: the state of Woqooyi Galbeed has (about) 120 people who know Jesus, 2,428 people who know about him culturally, and 846,852 people who are far from Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7078 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Woqooyi Galbeed prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Woqooyi Galbeed, Somalia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Mahra people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 120 believers in Woqooyi Galbeed.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Woqooyi Galbeed to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 120 believers in Woqooyi Galbeed against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

location.name: Woqooyi Galbeed
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Yemeni, Bajuni, Arab, Tunni, Oromo, Southern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Yemeni (21,000), Bajuni (11,000), Arab (6,300), Tunni (43,000), Oromo, Southern (88,000)
